comment._content: Mrs. Steven Beckwith Ayres (that spelling), wife of a congressman from the Bronx; in 1912 Mrs. Ayres was a leader of women supporters of the Democratic Party in New York City: uic.edu/orgs/cwluherstory/jofreeman/polhistory/1912.htm
